original_text: But there was a certain man, called Simon, which beforetime in the same city used sorcery, and bewitched the people of Samaria, giving out that himself was some great one:
korean_text: 그 성에 시몬이라 하는 사람이 전부터 있어 마술을 행하여 사마리아 백성을 놀라게 하며 자칭 큰 자라 하니

sentences.original_text: But there was a certain man, called Simon,
which beforetime in the same city used sorcery,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이전에 같은 성에서 마술을 사용하였고,

sentences.original_text: and bewitched the people of Samaria,
giving out that himself was some great one:
